results.name: Wasp
results.description: My secret power is that I get things done.

results.name: Wave
results.description: On Reveal: Next turn, cards in both players' hands cost 4.

results.name: White Queen
results.description: On Reveal: Draw a copy of the highest Cost card in your opponent's hand.

results.name: White Tiger
results.description: On Reveal: Add a 7-Power Tiger to another location.

results.name: Wolfsbane
results.description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

results.name: Wolverine
results.description:
When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location
with +2 Power.

results.name: Wong
results.description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities at this location happen twice.

results.name: Yellowjacket
results.description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards at this location with -1 Power.

results.name: Yondu
results.description: On Reveal: Destroy the top card of your opponent's deck.

results.name: Zero
results.description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
